data.name: FootRock 2 Demo
data.short_description: There are no rules and laws! We have abolished time, gravity and space. Challenge the ordinary reality in our crazy game!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3200+ / Intel Pentium 4 3200+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X2 255 / Intel Pentium E5500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3850 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
